Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to agency liaisons.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to provide for retrospective review by the department of buildings, the department of consumer affairs, the department of health and mental hygiene, the department of environmental protection, the department of sanitation, the department of transportation, and the fire department of those agencies’ existing violations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to agency liaisons.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to agency liaisons.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to agency liaisons.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
